name: stormkit
description: Stormkit is a serverless hosting and CI/CD platform for front-end apps with a management dashboard and API. The core service is SaaS; the repo provides app configuration and tooling.

features.title: Serverless Hosting
features.description: Deploys front-end applications to serverless infrastructure

features.title: Git Integration
features.description: Connects to GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket repositories

features.title: Automatic Deployments
features.description: Triggers builds on git push or pull requests

features.title: Preview Environments
features.description: Creates temporary environments for each pull request

features.title: Custom Domains
features.description: Configures custom domains with automatic SSL certificates

features.title: Environment Variables
features.description: Manages secrets and config per environment

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Optimizes builds for performance and size

features.title: Cdn Distribution
features.description: Serves static assets via global CDN
